name: Captain No-Beard
description: A new pirate captain who has yet to forge their legend
modifier: The basic captain without any specific strengths or weaknesses

name: Henry Morgan
description: An experienced pirate who has already completed several raids
modifier: He has amassed a good sum of wealth from previous work although it has come at the cost of some of his crew

name: Calico Jack
description: A captain named after the calico clothing he wore
modifier: His experience as a quartermaster has led to him always having supplies on hand at the cost of his starting gold

name: William Kidd
description: A scottish pirate who started out as a privateer
modifier: He has skill in raising his crew's moral although he is still unused to how many provisions are needed as a pirate

name: Anne Bonny
description: A pirate who has recently commited a mutiny and taken control of the ship
modifier: Her crew is quite large but as she is an inexperienced captain their morale isn't at its highest when they first set sail

name: Captain Blackbeard
description: One of the most feared pirates to ever sail the seas
modifier: A true scourge on the seas he has no weaknesses and it stronger than his piers in all respects
